definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun used as a male given name, of Latin origin, derived from the Roman family name Terentius. It is commonly used in English-speaking countries and carries no inherent meaning beyond its use as a personal identifier.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个用作男性名字的专有名词，源自拉丁语，由古罗马家族名 Terentius 演变而来，常见于英语国家，其本身并无特定含义，仅作为个人身份标识使用。
definitions.example_en: Terrence was awarded the prize for best actor at the film festival.
definitions.example_cn: 特伦斯在电影节上荣获最佳男演员奖。
